title.rendered: ’12th Fail’ becomes 1st film in 23 years to run in theatres for 25 weeks

content.rendered:
Vidhu Vinod Chopra’s 12th Fail has proved to be one of the most loved movies of 2023, continuing to receive love and praise from the audience. Starring Vikrant Massey in the lead role, the film not only emerged victorious at the box office but also did well in OTT. After making waves since its release in India, 12th Fall has reached another milestone by completing its silver jubilee at the box office. Setting a new record, 12th Fail became the first film in 23 years to successfully run for 25 weeks in theaters. Actor Vikrant Massey shared a message on Instagram to mark the occasion. Thanking the audience for their love, he wrote: “The first film in 23 years to reach this milestone. Thanks to the community for making our dreams come true. It’s really up to you to make this happen. Lots of love.”

The actor of the film, Medha Shankr, shared a message and wrote, “12thFail is celebrating its silver jubilee with a big film – 25 weeks and counting! Hello everyone who made this a cinematic triumph! »

Vidhu Vinod Chopra Films’ official Instagram shared a message, along with a heartfelt note about the achievement. Although the entire team is happy and excited for the success of the film, the fans have also shown love and congratulated the 12th failure and its team.
